about_the_game:
(We haven't finished the Enighlish Version of this game, but it will coming someday...)
This is a galgame, with love, campus, suspense elements. Player of the game can interactive with multiple female characters to experience be loved feeling which could hardly be experienced in the real life. In the very beiginning, the main character studied very hard in his high scool. because he is not very clever. However, some accidents happend, therefore, he meat some female characters. For they talking with each other several times, they became friends and finally one of them will become the girl friend of the main character. Those characters are designed so great with the magic could suddendly warmed the player's heart. The scenes are designed extremely beautiful, some of the backgrounds just looks like a painting. We used almost one year to paint every scene's details to make the player could have a happy feeling when playing in this game. When a player play the game, he(she) will feel himself(herself) could really experience a pure fantastic high school life.

content_descriptors.notes: Some pictures in this game shows the female characters' cute face and feelings, and those expressions may let players feel sextual. Kiss scence shows in the game. Hugs shows in the game, Sextual accents shows in the game. Cute female characters shows in the game.
